<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Status for Vff License (v2.0)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v2.0/api/tenants/{tenant_id}/vfflicenses/{license_id}/status"}></MethodEndpoint>



List the status for the Vff license.
